name: Insert blocks by name
description: Middle click or Shift+Click on the code area, or press Ctrl+Space to bring up a block-search window, then type the name of a block (or parts of it) and drag it out of the window to insert it without finding it in the block palette. To add multiple blocks at once, hold Shift while dragging the blocks out to avoid closing the window.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: This addon was completely reworked. You can now type inputs and reporters inside other blocks, and autocomplete using the Tab key.

info.text: This addon was previously part of the "developer tools" addon but has moved here.
